Rulings.Tengu:
● Your opponent can chain "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" or "Tragoedia" to this effect. 
This effect resolves (and the random card is chosen) after the Gorz/Tragoedia is Summoned.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to discard a card only activates if you attack directly with "X-Saber Airbellum" and inflict at least 1 damage.\n2. This effect will only activate if you attack your opponent directly and successfully inflict damage. If your opponent took 0 damage because of "Waboku", this effect will not activate.\n3. [FORUM] If "X-Saber Airbellum" makes a direct attack on an opponent that controls no cards and has "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" in hand, the effects of "X-Saber Airbellum" and "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" form a chain with "X-Saber Airbellum" becoming Chain Link 1 and "Gorz the Emissary of Darkness" becoming Chain Link 2.

PSCT.Tengu: ① If this card inflicts Direct Battle Damage: Your opponent discards 1 random card.
